question: [Challenge] Svenska: Ange the slope of the noisy line for linjen i diagrammet.

qas.question: [Challenge] Svenska: Ange the slope of the noisy line for linjen i diagrammet.
[Detailed] Turkce: Cizilen dogru icin the intercept of the noisy line belirt.
[Note] Deutsch: Bestimme the value of y when x equals 1 der dargestellten Gerade.
